DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , examiner-blinded , positive-controlled , parallel design clinical trial , feature 4 treatment arm . Forty-five ( 45 ) * HIV positive subject per treatment arm recruit 180 subject total . The study include 5 visit : screen visit , 14-day treatment phase baseline visit Day 1 , Day 7 visit , post-treatment visit 5 day last dose , follow-up visit . During screen visit subject assess study eligibility . Eligible subject randomize 1 follow treatment arm : A . 0.15 % PAC-113 mouthrinse ( 5 mL 4 time daily [ q.i.d . ] ) ; B . 0.075 % PAC-113 mouthrinse ( 5 mL q.i.d . ) ; C. 0.0375 % PAC-113 mouthrinse ( 5 mL q.i.d . ) ; D. Nystatin oral suspension ( 100,000 units/mL ; 5 mL q.i.d . ) Subjects evaluate clinically safety severity clinical sign symptom oral candidiasis baseline ( Day 1 ) , Day 7 , Day 19 ( 5 day post-treatment ) Day 28 ( follow-up visit ) . Subjects also microbiological analysis perform screening , Days 7 , 19 28 .
